hiveArticle.title: [Colourfulphotography] Celebration in a Temple
hiveArticle.body:
There was a celebration going on in the nearby temple which I have visited last evening. I am sharing few glimpses of those temple and the colorful decoration.

![IMG_20171231_214656.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRCcr9xHmftYdAZntHn2SBoSmUfMx3Aq5EZBZD1SQ8bfW/IMG_20171231_214656.jpg)

![IMG_20171231_214416.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQma4s3vTMZ83V2XfoChenMvFvSH9Lr5cGnkyz5bLsX71v2/IMG_20171231_214416.jpg)

![IMG_20171231_214612.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdV8Vi2sVB28VueMdNr1VoiDkHZXQrkpHBGCxRYR7ymJX/IMG_20171231_214612.jpg)
